thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Mel

author: Mel
title: Mel
text:
I took a good look at Finn's website after we decided to update out knowledge on current solar technology.
To our surprise we found that our problem of unuseable Northern Aspect roofs had been overcome.
Having absorbed as much of the information on Finn's website, we accepted his offer to have three suppliers contact us with Quote: s. All three contacted us within days and supplied Quote: s in subsequent days.
Interestingly, three Quote: s supplied with three technologies, String Inverters, Micro Inverters and String Inverters with Optimised panels. The technologies in two cases were based on recent aerial photogtaphy showing shading of our house across all four seasons.
We could easily see how orientation of the sun would affect our Panels. The computer app was also able to show proposed positionong of the panels on our roof.
We could see that 6kW of panels connected to an Inverter via two strings on East and West roofs would suffer little from shading.
We have placed an order with the Company that proposed this solution.
Very happy with Solar Solutions, all three suppliers and the one ultimeatly chosen.
